entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Three Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM MDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Fog dissipating. High plus 3.
